item.title: Inside the module
item.description: Inside the moduleThis page should be useful for someone willing to contribute to the module. To do so he/she needs to understand the module logic and structure. TerminologyThe following naming have been inspired by Facets vs Filters. Facets and Filters FiltersA filter is any assertion that can be used to filter a list of products and does not contain logical operators such as “and” or “or” when expressed in plain English.
